description.value:
The Spiritual Student is someone who has a core belief in something greater than themselves. This belief could be drawn from a religion, or possibly a broad conviction in the strength of human goodness. They may feel as if they are guided along by ancestors or other spirits, divine beings, or perhaps even by fate itself.

Restriction: Must start the game with at least 12 Wisdom

Student Abilities:

  • Characteristic Points: +2 to Wisdom, +1 to Any Other

  • Starting Skills: Insight, Academic Arts, Purity

  • Self-Disciplined: @UUID[Compendium.mka.studenttypes.TNVn39Apg6KLWNPu]{Self-Disciplined} You may use Inspiration and, as a Free Action, your next Wisdom Skill Check result becomes 20+Mod. You may only use this ability during a Non-Combat Encounter and it can used after dice are rolled.
